prog03.ApplicationConstants

    • Uses of ApplicationConstants in prog03

      Classes in prog03 that implement ApplicationConstants 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimationApp
      This is a version of the animation project that uses inheritance (both the Box and Ellipse classes derive from GraphicObject).
      class  Box
      The Box class rewritten as a subclass of GraphicObject
      class  Ellipse
      The Ellipse class rewritten as a subclass of GraphicObject
      class  GraphicObject
      This abstract class is the parent class for all classes of graphic objects.
